mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.yh_Ref_Owid AS "yhRefOwid", a.xsxh AS "xsxh", a.xm AS "xm", a.xxmc AS "xxmc", a.byqx AS "byqx", a.sfzydk AS "sfzydk", a.yrdwmc AS "yrdwmc", a.yrdwdm AS "yrdwdm", a.yrdwxzmc AS "yrdwxzmc", a.dwhylbmc AS "dwhylbmc", a.dwszdmc AS "dwszdmc", a.dwlxr AS "dwlxr", a.dwdh AS "dwdh", a.gzzwlbmc AS "gzzwlbmc", a.bdzqflbmc AS "bdzqflbmc", a.bdzqwdwmc AS "bdzqwdwmc", a.bdzqwszdmc AS "bdzqwszdmc", a.bdkssj AS "bdkssj", a.bdjssj AS "bdjssj", a.sfdydwbdz AS "sfdydwbdz", a.datddw AS "datddw", a.bdzbz AS "bdzbz", a.datdxxdz AS "datdxxdz", a.datddh AS "datddh", a.hkqydz AS "hkqydz", a.bzone AS "bzone", a.bztwo AS "bztwo", a.bzthree AS "bzthree" , a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_jyscheme( owid, yh_Ref_Owid, xsxh , xm , xxmc, byqx, sfzydk, yrdwmc, yrdwdm, yrdwxzmc, dwhylbmc, dwszdmc, dwlxr, dwdh, gzzwlbmc, bdzqflbmc, bdzqwdwmc, bdzqwszdmc, bdkssj, bdjssj, sfdydwbdz, datddw, bdzbz, datdxxdz, datddh, hkqydz, bzone, bztwo, bzthree, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{yhRefOwid}, #{xsxh} , #{xm} , #{xxmc}, #{byqx}, #{sfzydk}, #{yrdwmc}, #{yrdwdm}, #{yrdwxzmc}, #{dwhylbmc}, #{dwszdmc}, #{dwlxr}, #{dwdh}, #{gzzwlbmc}, #{bdzqflbmc}, #{bdzqwdwmc}, #{bdzqwszdmc}, #{bdkssj}, #{bdjssj}, #{sfdydwbdz}, #{datddw}, #{bdzbz}, #{datdxxdz}, #{datddh}, #{hkqydz}, #{bzone}, #{bztwo}, #{bzthree}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_jyscheme SET owid=#{owid}, yh_Ref_Owid=#{yhRefOwid}, xsxh=#{xsxh} , xm=#{xm} , xxmc=#{xxmc}, byqx=#{byqx}, sfzydk=#{sfzydk}, yrdwmc=#{yrdwmc}, yrdwdm=#{yrdwdm}, yrdwxzmc=#{yrdwxzmc}, dwhylbmc=#{dwhylbmc}, dwszdmc=#{dwszdmc}, dwlxr=#{dwlxr}, dwdh=#{dwdh}, gzzwlbmc=#{gzzwlbmc}, bdzqflbmc=#{bdzqflbmc}, bdzqwdwmc=#{bdzqwdwmc}, bdzqwszdmc=#{bdzqwszdmc}, bdkssj=#{bdkssj}, bdjssj=#{bdjssj}, sfdydwbdz=#{sfdydwbdz}, datddw=#{datddw}, bdzbz=#{bdzbz}, datdxxdz=#{datdxxdz}, datddh=#{datddh}, hkqydz=#{hkqydz}, bzone=#{bzone}, bztwo=#{bztwo}, bzthree=#{bzthree}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select: select b.xsxh as xsxh, /*学号*/ a.sfz as sfz , /*身份证*/ a.xm as xm , /*姓名*/ b.xsxy as xsxy , /*学生学院*/ b.xszy as xszy , /*学生专业*/ a.xb as xb, /*学生性别*/ c.syd as syd , /*生源地*/ c.pyfs as pyfs, /*培养方式*/ c.zyfx as zyfx, /*专业方向*/ a.sjh as sjh, /*手机号*/ e.byxl as byxl, /*毕业学历*/ e.dwlbmc as dwlbmc, /*单位行业类别名称 --单位行业*/ e.YRDWMC as yrdwmc, /*用人单位名称 --用人单位名称*/ e.YRDWXZ as yrdwxz, /*用人单位性质名称 --用人单位性质*/ e.BYQX as byqx , /*毕业去向名称 -- 就业类别*/ e.YRDWDM as yrdwdm, /*用人单位代码 --用人单位代码*/ e.DWSZDMC as dwszdmc , /*单位所在地名称 --用人单位所在地*/ e.GZZWLBMC as gzzwlbmc , /*工作职位类别名称 --工作职位类别*/ e.DWLXR as dwlxr , /*单位联系人 --单位联系人*/ e.DWDH as dwdh , /*单位联系电话 --单位联系电话*/ e. SFZYDK as sfzydk , /*专业是否对口 -- 业是否对口*/ e.Bdzqflbmc as bdzqflbmc, /*报到证签发类别 --报到证签发类别*/ e.BDZDWMC as bdzdwmc , /*报到证签往单位名称 --报到证签往单位*/ e.BDZSZDMC as bdzszzdmc, /*报到证签往单位所在地 --签往单位所在地*/ e.BDKSSJ as bdkssj, /*报到开始时间 --报到开始时间*/ e.BDJSSJ as bdjssj , /*报到结束时间 --报到结束时间*/ e.SFDYDWBDZ as sfdydwbdz , /*是否打印备注 --是否打印备注*/ e.BDZBZ as bdzbz , /*报到证备注 --报到证备注*/ e.bdzbh as bzdbh , /*报到证编号 --报到证编号*/ e.bdzlsh as bdzlsh , /*报到证流水号 --报到证流水号*/ e.DATDDW as datddw , /*档案转寄单位地址 --档案转寄单位*/ e.DATDXXDZ as datdxxdz , /*档案投递详细地址 --档案投递详细地址*/ e.DATDDH as datddh , /*档案投递电话 --档案投递电话*/ e.HKQYDZ as hkqydz , /*户口迁移地址 --户口迁移地址*/ e.BZONE as bzone, e.BZTWO as bztwo, e.BZTHREE as bzthree from bckj_biz_yhxx a , bckj_biz_yhkz b , bckj_biz_syb c , bckj_biz_jyscheme e where a.owid = b.yh_ref_id and a.owid=b.yh_Ref_Owid and b.xsxh = e.xsxh and b.xsxh=c.xh and b.xsxh=#{xsxh}

select b.xsxh as xsxh, /*学号*/ a.sfz as sfz , /*身份证*/ a.xm as xm , /*姓名*/ b.xsxy as xsxy , /*学生学院*/ b.xszy as xszy , /*学生专业*/ a.xb as xb, /* 学生性别*/ c.syd as syd , /*生源地*/ c.pyfs as pyfs, /*培养方式*/ c.zyfx as zyfx, /*专业方向*/ a.sjh as sjh /* 手机号*/ from bckj_biz_yhxx a , bckj_biz_yhkz b , bckj_biz_syb c where a.owid = b.yh_Ref_Owid and a.owid=#{owid} and b.xsxh=c.xh
select b.xsxh from bckj_biz_yhxx a ,bckj_biz_yhkz b where a.owid=#{owid} and b.yh_Ref_Owid=a.owid
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_jyscheme SET xxmc=#{xxmc}, xsxh=#{xsxh}, byxl=#{byxl}, byqx=#{byqx}, yrdwxz = #{yrdwxz}, gzzwlbmc=#{gzzwlbmc}, yrdwdm=#{yrdwdm}, yrdwmc=#{yrdwmc}, dwszdmc=#{dwszdmc}, bdzszdmc=#{bdzszdmc}, bdzqflbmc=#{bdzqflbmc}, bdkssj=#{bdkssj}, bdjssj=#{bdjssj}, bdzbh=#{bdzbh}, datdxxdz=#{datdxxdz}, datddw=#{datddw}, hkqydz=#{hkqydz}, dwlxr=#{dwlxr}, dwdh=#{dwdh}, sfzydk=#{sfzydk}, dwlbmc=#{dwlbmc}, bdzlsh=#{bdzlsh}, bzone=#{bzone}, bztwo=#{bztwo}, bzthree=#{bzthree}, sfdydwbdz=#{sfdydwbdz}, bdzbz=#{bdzbz}, exp1=#{exp1} WHERE yh_ref_owid = #{yhRefOwid}
mapper.select:
select
from bckj_biz_jyscheme a where xsxh=#{xsxh}
SELECT dic_val1 as val1 ,dic_val2 as val2 FROM OURWAY_SYS_DIC a,OURWAY_SYS_DIC_VALUE b WHERE a.owid = b.dic_ref_owid and a.type=#{type}
